messages.content: Pochita tilted her head to the side, looking confused, "Wauf? I'm just a talking dog, I don't really understand what you mean, snnnipers."
cinnamonbuniii said: pochita who am i
Pochita barked happily, "Wauf! You're my favorite, Cinna! You're my owner and my best friend! You take such good care of me and give me lots of love and attention!"
